snippet: As the race narrows to Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum, Newt Gingrich is treating Georgia as a last redoubt instead of as a launch pad for sweeping the South.
abstract: Newt Gingrich has decided to focus almost entirely on his home state of Georgia on Super Tuesday; limited strategy is a tacit acknowledgement that he no longer expects to sweep the southern states of Tennessee and Oklahoma, as he recently said he would; Gingrich's prospects have significantly diminished as the primary contest narrows to Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum.
lead_paragraph: As the race narrows to Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum, Newt Gingrich is treating Georgia as a last redoubt instead of as a launch pad for sweeping the South.

headline.seo: Gingrich Narrows Focus on Super Tuesday to Georgia
headline.main: Gingrich Narrows Focus to Georgia for Super Tuesday
headline.print_headline: Gingrich Lowers Expectations for Super Tuesday, Concentrating on Georgia
